testcase.name: Player goes back to starting room and leaves previous room
Checks if throwing an item breaks it
NPC returns to original room, checks cases of adult and child
Testing the NPC array to make sure its in an expected state before movement
Tests if a broken item can be acted upon
Testing the NPC array to make sure its in an expected state after movement
Player goes back to starting room and is added back
NPC leaves previous room, checks if the adult leaves the room and then if the child leaves the room
NPC is added to new room, checks adult npc then child npc
Cleans Broken item, checks adult case then child case
